short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The browser extension for blocking spoilers of anime.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension to block spoilers on some services. Currently, it's supported only on YouTube, and only from the watch history of a Crunchyroll and HIDIVE.
